content: at each end of row for left and right foreleg markers head back seam cast-off edge to right neck marker see fig 4 join yarn e continue with yarn cde changing to yarn cd as directed pick up and knit from a to b knit across from c to d pick up and knit as follows from e to f left foreleg row 1 purl all 35sts work short row to shape left foreleg shoulder d short row 1 increase cast on 12 sts for left foreleg k19 w+tk c short row 2 p19 short row 3 k20 w+tk short row 4 p20 row 10 k21 sts in yarn cd knit 36 sts to end of row b e right foreleg work short row to shape right foreleg shoulder f a short row 1 increase cast on 12 sts for right foreleg p19 w+tp right muzzle left muzzle short row 2 k19 marker marker short row 3 p20 w+tp fig 4 short row 4 k20 new born puppy pattern page 13 new born puppy pattern page 14 row 11 p49 sts in yarn cde p20 sts to end of row work short row to shape rear left foreleg seam short row 1 k14 w+tk work short row to shape knee bend in left foreleg short row 2 p6 w+tp short row 1 k7 w+tk short row 3 k5 w+tk short row 2 p7 short row 4 p6 w+tp short row 3 k8 w+tk short row 5 k5 w+tk short row 4 p8 short row 6 p12 to end of row short row 5 k9 w+tk short row 6 p9 row 14 knit across all 57 sts to the end of row so you can work on the rear right foreleg seam row 12 decrease cast off 6 sts for left paw pm for left knee bend marker on last cast-off stitch knit next 13 sts in yarn cd knit 49 sts work short row to shape rear right foreleg seam to other side to work on right leg - 63sts short row 1 p14 w+tp cut yarn e - you won t be needing it for a while short row 2 k6 w+tk short row 3 p5 w+tp work short row to shape knee bend in right foreleg short row 4 k6 w+tk short row 1 p7 w+tk short row 5 p5 w+tp short row 2 k7 short row 6 k12 to end of row short row 3 p8 w+tk short row 4 k8 row 15 purl across all 57 sts to the end of row short row 5 p9 w+tk row 16 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 59sts short row 6 k9 row 17 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 61sts row 18 increase kfb knit to last st kfb - 63sts row 13 decrease cast off 6 sts purl-wise for right paw pm for right row 19 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 65sts knee bend marker on last cast-off stitch
